subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project is aiming to strengthen Kukes Region stakeholders’ capacities and prepare the institutional framework for full participation and implementation of Cross Border Cooperation Programmes when available. The project is expected to contribute in setting the ground for a fully-fledged Cross Border Cooperation Programme Albania – Kosovo if and when available through mirroring a future Cross Border Cooperation programme between both countries in both structures and operations. It will also support the implementation of Cross Border Cooperation related small-scale interventions in infrastructure and capacity building.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Kukes Cross Border IPA 07
